name: Insanity (BeetleJuicee0827)
description:
You awaken in a dark labyrinth, with no memory of how you got there. The walls seem to close in on you as you navigate through the twists and turns, your only company is the eerie sound of your own footsteps and the haunting melodies of distant melancholic music.

As you progress, the maze seems to shift and change before your very eyes. The darkness begins to play tricks on your mind, and you can feel your sanity slipping away with each passing moment.

Will you be able to keep your wits about you, and find your way out of this twisted maze? Or will you succumb to the insanity that grips your mind, and become yet another lost soul, trapped forever in the maze's endless halls? The choice is yours, in this dark and twisted journey into the depths of Insanity.
